definition: numerous and close together/(of hair) luxuriant/(of woods) dense/(of gunfire) intense
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: The red lotus, the dense rain, played around Qi oblique.
sentences.chinese: 那朵紅蓮，被那繁密的雨點，打得左右攲斜。

sentences.english: Tigers live by themselves on wooded mountains while cats are dependent on man.
sentences.chinese: 老虎自己住在繁密的大山上而貓卻要依靠人。

sentences.english: The land was once covered with luxuriant forests.
sentences.chinese: 這片土地曾經被繁密的森林覆蓋着。

sentences.english: Do cows raised in climates that produce lush pastures produce better natural gut?
sentences.chinese: 生活在繁密的草原的牛能生產更好的天然腸線麼？

sentences.english: As the raindrops fell more densely, the red lotus flower began to sway from side to side.
sentences.chinese: 那朵紅蓮，被那繁密的雨點，打得左右攲斜。

sentences.english: The intricate linear bands are a modern contrast that reflects the traditional ornate façade.
sentences.chinese: 繁密的金屬線條與傳統華麗的立面形成對比。

definition: branches and tendrils/fig. overcomplicated or digressive
uneven and jumbled (idiom); irregular and disorderly/in a tangled mess
verdant/lush green and full of life
